recipe.title: Eton Mess Ice-cream Sandwich Recipe by Tasty

steps.step: Cut the tops off of strawberries and apply to the bottom of two pieces of meringue.
Place a large scoop of ice cream on top of the strawberry side of one meringue and cover with second meringue to create a sandwich.
